</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 26, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 211 <sup>4.0</sup>, [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 80 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Confident in your technique, you don’t easily lose your concentration when you Cast a Spell. If a reaction would disrupt your spellcasting action, attempt a DC 15 flat check. If you succeed, your action isn’t disrupted.

<title level="2">Steady Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Ward Casting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1136)
name: Steady Spellcasting
